nodes.text: A queen was the female ruler of a monarchy. The male equivalent was a king.
On Naboo, the queen ruled the planet as an elected leader. Yram, Réillata, Sanandrassa, Padmé Amidala, Jamillia, Neeyutnee, Apailana, and Sosha Soruna all served as Queen of Naboo.
Several other worlds, such as Alderaan, Bardotta, Hynestia, Ktath'atn, Livorno, Rendel, Sarka, and Zygerria, also had some form of monarchy ruled by a queen.
During the Clone Wars, Zygerria and its slave empire were ruled by Queen Miraj Scintel, until she was killed by Count Dooku, and Queen Julia reigned over Bardotta.
Breha Organa was the Queen of Alderaan, until the planet's destruction by the Galactic Empire's Death Star during the Galactic Civil War.
The Geonosians also had queens, including Karina the Great who served as the secret leader of the Stalgasin hive.
Princess Trios of Shu-Torun became the new monarch of her homeworld shortly after her father was murdered by Darth Vader's assassin droids, BT-1 and 0-0-0.

Some female individuals of the Yalbec species were recognized as queens. During an insurrection on Yalbec Prime, a clone commando squad known as Clone Force 99 met one of these queens, whose stinger was cut off by a soldier named Wrecker. The stinger of a Yalbec queen was considered by some people as a delicacy.
